title: Boston National Historical Park: Permits & Reservations
body: Explore This Park    Plan Your Visit     Basic Information     Permits & Reservations               Permits & Reservations        Permits  For information about permits or special events at Boston National Historical Park, please click here.       Reservations  For Admission to Historic Sites in the Park Visitation at Boston National Historical Park can be quite high, especially during the spring, summer, and fall months.  Although reservations are not required to visit many of the sites for groups, they are strongly recommended. Planning ahead and making a reservation ensures that your group will be accommodated, and helps to provide your group with a satisfying and safe experience during your time here in Boston. Go to Plan Your Visit to learn more about which sites require large group reservations.  You can also click on the list at the bottom of the page to earn more about reservations at our partner sites. Click on Make a Reservation to make your group reservation by phone or email.       Links to our Partner Sites and their Programs Old South Meeting House Old State House Paul Revere House Old North Church USS Constitution Museum
